column2: ENGLISH
Qom'i
This character is an adherent of the Ayatollahs of the Qom'i Hawza of Ithna'ashariyya
Najaf'i
This character is an adherent of the Ayatollahs of the Najaf'i Hawza of Ithna'ashariyya
You embrace the Qom'i school of thought.
column3: Vous vous joignez à l'école théologique Qom'i.
column4: Ihr verschreibt Euch der Denkweise der Qom'i.

column2: The Qom'i Hawza holds to an absolutist interpretation of the Wilayat al-Faqih, arguing that Islamic Jurists should have rule over the political sphere as well as that of religious law.
This is the right path.
You embrace the Najaf'i school of thought.
column3: Vous vous joignez à l'école théologique Najaf'i.
column4: Ihr verschreibt Euch der Denkweise der Najaf'i.

column2: The Najaf'i Hawza holds to a limited interpretation of the Wilayat al-Faqih, arguing that the power of Islamic Jurists must be limited to matters of religious law and charity, leaving secular power to the rulers.
Embrace the Qom'i School
You embrace the Qom'i school of theology.
Embrace the Najaf'i School
You embrace the Najaf'i school of theology.
Rejected School
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a follower of the Qom'i school of theology.
Yes.
No.
You ask your vassal to switch theological school.
column3: Vous demandez à votre vassal de changer d'école théologique.

column2: It has come to my attention that you're a follower of the misguided Qom'i school. Their tenets and philosophies are an affront to God and the sunnah of the Prophet (peace be upon him). I urge you instead to embrace the Najaf'i doctrine.\n\nSigned
Yes.
Never!
You send word that you agree to adopt the Najaf'i school.
column3: Vous faites savoir que vous acceptez de suivre les principes Salimites.

column2: As always.
A wise choice.
You send word that you refuse to adopt the Najaf'i school.
column3: Vous faites savoir que vous refusez de suivre les principes Salimites.

column2: You may be my liege in the mortal world.
That impudent...!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a follower of the Najaf'i school of theology.
Yes.
No.
You ask your vassal to switch theological school.
column3: Vous demandez à votre vassal de changer d'école théologique.

column2: It has come to my attention that you're a follower of the misguided Najaf'i school. Their tenets and philosophies are incompatible with the conditions of the world, and hold us back needlessly. I urge you instead to embrace the Qom'i doctrine.\n\nSigned
Yes.
Never!
You send word that you agree to adopt the Qom'i school.
column3: Vous faites savoir que vous acceptez de suivre les principes Muntaqiyuns.

column2: As always.
A wise choice.
You send word that you refuse to adopt the Qom'i school.
column3: Vous faites savoir que vous refusez de suivre les principes Muntaqiyuns.

column2: You may be my liege in the mortal world.
That impudent...!
Given your dogmatic nature, you are beginning to doubt whether the Najaf'i school is truly right for you.
Perhaps I have been walking the wrong path...
column3: J'ai peut-être choisi la mauvaise voie...
column4: Vielleicht wandelte ich bislang auf Irrwegen...
column6: Quizá haya tomado el camino equivocado…

column2: No! I must purge my mind of such heretical thoughts.
Given your privately pious nature, you are beginning to doubt whether the Qom'i school is truly right for you.
No! I must purge my mind of such misguided notions.
Appoint Al-Waqil
This character has become more powerful than the current al-Waqil and may be appointed as defender of the [ROOT.religion.GetName] faithful

[old_al_waqil.GetBestName] is no longer fit to be Al-Waqil of the [ROOT.religion.GetName] faithful. The Maraji have decided to recognize you as the Al-Waqil in his place.
I will accept this honor.
